Name: Promotion of civil service examinations.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the promotion of civil service examinations
BodyName: Committee on Civil Service and Labor

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Civil Service and Labor
This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee

Attachments.Name: Minutes of the Stated Meeting - April 18, 2024

Summary: This bill would require the Department of Citywide Administrative Services to engage in an advertising campaign to promote civil service examinations. This would include promotion on agency websites, social media, online advertising, as well as advertising on television, radio, and public transportation, or LinkNYC kiosks.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
      Section 1. Chapter 2 of title 12 of the administrative code of the city of New York, is amended by adding a new section 12-220 to read as follows:
      � 12-220 Promotion of civil service examinations. a. Definitions. As used in this section, the term "LinkNYC kiosk" means a public communications structure, on which advertising is permitted pursuant to a franchise agreement with the city.
      b. The commissioner of citywide administrative services shall conduct an advertising campaign to promote civil service examinations throughout the city. Such campaign shall include promotion through social media; agency websites; online advertising; and advertising on television, radio, public transportation, or LinkNYC kiosks. 
      � 2. This local law takes effect immediately.
